article.title: A note on the existence of tubular neighbourhoods on Finsler manifolds and minimization of orthogonal geodesics to a submanifold

multiple_choice_question.text: **(2.1)  g<sub>v</sub>(u, w) = (1/2) d²/dtds (F²(v + tu + sw))|<sub>t=s=0</sub>**\n\nThis formula defines the:
choices: Length of a curve in a Finsler manifold.
Distance between two points in a Finsler manifold.
Fundamental tensor of F² in a Finsler manifold.
Legendre transformation in a Finsler manifold.

multiple_choice_question.text: **(2.2)  d<sub>F</sub>(p,q) = inf<sub>γ∈C<sub>p,q</sub></sub> l<sub>F</sub>(γ)**\n\nThis formula defines the:
choices: Length of a geodesic in a Finsler manifold.
Distance between two points in a Finsler manifold.
Fundamental tensor of F² in a Finsler manifold.
Cut value of a vector in a Finsler manifold.
